list_analysis.pilot_result:
Based on the provided analysis results and the updated context, I have selected the top three recommendations that meet both the minimum confidence score of 0.6 and the maximum selections limit of 3. Here are the optimized selection options in order:

```JSON
[
    {
        "Number": "1",
        "Title": "Planning and building | Stoke-on-Trent",
        "Source": "https:\/\/www.stoke.gov.uk\/info\/20005\/planning_and_building",
        "Reasoning": "This link offers straightforward information about planning and building services in Stoke-on-Trent, covering key topics like planning permissions and local searches.",
        "Confidence": "85"
    },
    {
        "Number": "3",
        "Title": "Search planning applications | Stoke-on-Trent",
        "Source": "https:\/\/www.stoke.gov.uk\/homepage\/90\/search_planning_applications",
        "Reasoning": "This link gives users the ability to search planning applications in Stoke-on-Trent, making it easier to access information about ongoing and past development projects.",
        "Confidence": "80"
    },
    {
        "Number": "4",
        "Title": "STOKE-ON-TRENT PLANNING SERVICES AUTHORITY ...",
        "Source": "https:\/\/www.stoke.gov.uk\/download\/downloads\/id\/2653\/planning_services_authority_monitoring_report_2024.pdf",
        "Reasoning": "This PDF document from Stoke-on-Trent's planning services authority offers valuable insights into the types of development projects being approved in the city for the 2024 year. It specifically includes examples of applications that feature renewable energy technology.",
        "Confidence": "75"
    }
]
```
These rankings are based on relevance (30% weight), credibility (15% weight), information depth (30% weight), accessibility (20% weight), and novelty (5% weight) factors. Link # 1 provides a broad overview of planning and building services in Stoke-on-Trent, while link # 3 enables users to search for planning applications by map or list. Lastly, link #4 includes a detailed monitoring report of planning activities happening in Stoke-on-Trent with an emphasis on renewable energy technology projects.
